origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FintechAPI.get_impact_on_traditional_finance', 'description': 'This function provides insights into how fintech has impacted traditional finance in the specified sector and impact type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector of finance to focus on, e.g., banking, insurance, investments.'}, {'name': 'impactType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of impact to analyze, e.g., disruption, enhancement, transformation.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact', 'description': 'A detailed analysis of the impact of fintech on the specified sector and impact type.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FintechAPI.get_impact_on_traditional_finance, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'banking', 'impactType'是'disruption'.
